channel.title: Robotics on Mobile Robot I/O
channel.description: Recent content in Robotics on Mobile Robot I/O

item.title: Mobile Robot I/O Project
item.description: Building a useful Robot is hard, in large part because Robotics is an inter-disciplinary subject matter requiring a high level of mastery of a number of complex subjects, (some of which we have listed below).

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Project Definition

The Mobile Robot I/O Project is more than a single project, really it is a group of projects related to building, running and maintaining a mobile robot.
